item.title: Report X-2025011199
item.description:
Report X-2025011199

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-10
  • City: HILLSBORO
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PART TIME SUPERVISOR NOTIFIED RESPONDER OF A STRONG SMELL COMING FROM THE PACKAGE CAR PARKED AT 414. RESPONDER COULD SMELL IT UPON APPROACH. RESPONDER ENTERED PACKAGE CAR AND CHECKED EVERY PACKAGE UNTIL LEAKER WAS FOUND. LEAKER CONTAINED AND TAKEN BACK TO THE PSC FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. SDS SEARCH REVEALED PRODUCT WAS AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2025011202
item.description:
Report X-2025011202

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS DISCOVERED ON THE EAST DEBAG BELT AND WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND TO CONTAIN A FLAMMABLE LIQUID PRODUCT, "AERO-THANE," BUT NO HAZARD LABELS WERE ATTACHED TO THE BOX. THE SDS FOR THE PRODUCT LISTS IT AS "UN1263 PAINT, 3, PG II." THE SUSPECTED UNDELCARED HAZMAT WAS REPORTED TO RMP.
